reviews.text: Super friendly staff, fast service. So many pizza varieties to choose from. No other pizza shop beats Lona Pizza‚Äôs authentic Italian taste. 10/10 recommend. Ty Lona Pizza!!
The pizza was phenomenal and I will be back again when I‚Äôm back in the area it was very good

This pizza place is one of the best or the best in the neighborhood the pizza is so good, crunchy, cooked perfectly, and the pizza doesn‚Äôt have lots of oil! These is a go-to stop if u need pizza or food,service is nice and the place itself is cozy and friendly, if u need a pizza place this is the place!
Best pizza in the Bronx friendly staff came here once and kept coming back
Pizzas pretty terrible tbh.
Disgusting rude and disrespectful person.
This place is a true hidden gem in the Bronx. The pepperoni pizza is easily one of my favorites in NYC‚Äîit has that classic New York flavor that takes me back to the old-school pizzerias.
Great crust. Nice crunch. Good amount of cheese and sauce. Not to oily from the cheese. I'm coming in from jersey to visit my girl, and this is always a stop before going home
Friendly atmosphere.  Good pizza. Busy
If it‚Äôs not from here I won‚Äôt eat it, this is the best pizza I‚Äôve tasted. Highly recommended, worth the walk
Best pizza in this neighborhood by far. I walk 2 miles to come here instead of going to a pizza shop around my way
Love the pizza !! Nice n thin n crispy!!

I love Lonna‚Äôs pizza! I‚Äôm fairly new to the neighborhood and while I‚Äôm not over the moon with the *less than 1 mile* food options in the area, Lonna‚Äôs is in my top 10. One of the very few places that still has the authentic food taste, customer service, and atmosphere of an Italian Mom & Pop shop. Also, the owner is a nice guy, not too talkative but the more I frequent the more conversation we start to have. Glad this place is still servicing the Norwood area and I hope it continues to do so!

I always walk by this pizza shop & it always looked empty. Me personally when I walk by pizza shops I hope to get a whiff of that pizza being made fresh, but that wasn‚Äôt the case here. After I built the courage to try it out, I stood shut and took all my words back. Moral of the story never judge a book by its cover üòÇ definitely making this spot my go to, tired of dominos & papa John‚Äôs!!!!

On the whole entire 204th and Bainbridge strip, there's no better pizza. There's a reason he only servers pizza and beef patties. His pizza is mind blowing. Take the trip and go here instead of sals, your belly will thank you!
Wait times can be a little, if they tell you it's 20 min for a pie, then it's 20 min. But it is well worth the wait. Everything is made with love.
Always great pizza. Kids and I to go spot for lazy pizza nights
The pizza was tasty and the crust was perfectly crunchy
Good pizza

I recently tried the pizza at Lona's Pizza, and I must say, it was a delight. The taste was exceptional, with a perfect blend of cheese that wasn't overwhelming, allowing the flavors to shine through. just a harmonious combination that truly captured the essence of a well-crafted pizza. If you're looking for a pizza that stays true to its roots and delivers a satisfying experience, Lona's Pizza is definitely worth a visit.

Best pizza in town. Hard to say if it‚Äôs the #1 or not because when everybody talks about the best pizza in the Bronx, a lot of people mention Louie & Ernie‚Äôs. This might be better.
Super thin crust. Amazing sauce. 1,000/10. A+++
A really big slice and it was super delicious! Definitely would come again and again:)
If you want a pizza fix...get it here...it's not the best I had....but their pizza is better than Sal's...it just taste like pizza

Great pizza

The place is very friendly, the pizza is nicely sized, and SO delicious! The pizza there is a great price and they also sell patties and some cold beverages.

Topping might be limited but it's still WAY worth it coming here!

Everytime I eat pizza, and the place is near, I eat it from here!

I've tried pizza from North and South America and the pizza here is the best I've had!

My favorite pizza place in all of America! (And I can only say America 'cuz I haven't tried pizza from any other part of the world, but I dont think even the other continents can do better- or at least, too better).
Great taste and perfect crunch.
Best pizza!!! This was literally my 1st stop in the BX after coming from LGA.

Just popped in to grab a slice while my wife shopped for groceries next door. Slice was a good size and tasted great. Slice was very well balanced in regards to it‚Äôs chewy/crunchy ratio. Would definitely swing by here again if I‚Äôm in the neighborhood.
Best pizza in all of New York, been coming here for at least 10 years now no one can compare!
The food and service is excellent.I have traveled to California for a slice of pizza and nobody can compare with LONA'S PIZZA THE BEST PIZZA IN THE BRONX SO FAR AMAZING DELICIOUS SLICES .
Best pizza, very clean, owner is a wonderful man.

Good sized slice for $3. Generous amount of cheese.  Old style Italian pizza: oregano and garlic flavored  sauce.

this  guy makes the best peperoni  slice  this side of    204 st   this pizza  is one of the best in the bronx  i go in there order my slices  the guy remember me  all the time   that's good  costumer service when the  guy remembers you  fresh  and crunchy pizza all the time  close to home    keep up the good work
